events.Showed Mido Sword & Shield: open_forest == 'open' or (is_child and Kokiri_Sword and Buy_Deku_Shield)

locations.KF GS Know It All House:
is_child and can_child_attack and at_night and
                (had_night_start or can_play(Suns_Song) or
                (glitch_forest_escape and (can_jumpslash or Nuts or glitch_insane or can_dive or has_explosives or can_use(Dins_Fire))))
locations.KF GS House of Twins:
is_adult and at_night and 
                (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Boomerang) or can_isg)

exits.KF Outside Deku Tree: 'Showed Mido Sword & Shield' or (glitch_mido_skip and (can_jumpslash or can_hover or can_mega)) or is_adult
exits.LW Bridge From Forest:
can_leave_forest or
                (glitch_forest_escape and (Kokiri_Sword or Nuts or can_wess or glitch_insane))

events.Showed Mido Sword & Shield: open_forest == 'open' or (is_child and Kokiri_Sword and Buy_Deku_Shield)

locations.Deku Baba Sticks: (is_adult and not shuffle_dungeon_entrances) or Kokiri_Sword or can_isg or Boomerang

exits.Deku Tree Lobby:
is_child or 
                ((shuffle_dungeon_entrances and 'Showed Mido Sword & Shield') or glitch_deku_entry)
exits.Kokiri Forest: 'Showed Mido Sword & Shield' or is_adult or (glitch_mido_skip and can_hover)

locations.LW GS Above Theater:
is_adult and at_night and
                (can_use(Longshot) or here(can_plant_bean) or can_hover or
                ((has_bombchus or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire)) and can_use(Hookshot)))

exits.Lost Woods: is_child or at('Lost Woods', can_play(Sarias_Song)) or can_bomb_slide or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_shield) or (Bombs and can_shield)

exits.Sacred Forest Meadow:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or has_explosives or 
                Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Megaton_Hammer)

locations.SFM GS: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and at_night and is_adult

exits.Lost Woods: can_use(Longshot) or can_mega or can_hover or (Bombs and can_live_dmg(0.5))

exits.HF Cow Grotto:
(is_child and can_blast_or_smash) or
                can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or can_weirdclip or can_ledge_cancel

locations.Pierre: is_adult and Bonooru and not free_scarecrow
locations.LH Sun:
can_use(Bow) and 
                (can_use(Distant_Scarecrow) or 'Water Temple Clear' or can_hover)
locations.LH GS Lab Wall: is_child and (Boomerang or can_jumpslash) and at_night
locations.LH GS Tree: can_use(Longshot) or (can_use(Hookshot) and (can_isg or glitch_hookshot_jump or glitch_insane)) or (can_hover and has_bombchus and glitch_insane)

exits.Zoras Domain:
(is_child and (can_dive or can_jumpslash or glitch_lab_clip)) or
                (is_adult and (can_mega or (can_isg and Bombs and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or can_use(Nayrus_Love))) or
                    (glitch_lab_clip and 'Water Temple Clear')))
exits.LH Fishing Island: is_child or can_use(Scarecrow) or here(can_plant_bean) or 'Water Temple Clear' or can_hover or (can_enemy_hover and glitch_insane)

events.Eyedrops Access:
(is_adult or can_equipswap) and
                ('Eyeball Frog Access' or (Eyeball_Frog and disable_trade_revert))

locations.LH Lab Dive:
(Progressive_Scale, 2) or (Iron_Boots and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                (has_bottle_item and can_use(Hover_Boots) or (can_isg and has_cutscene_item))

locations.GV GS Small Bridge: is_child and (can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and at_night

exits.GV Fortress Side:
can_mega or can_hover or can_use(Hookshot) or 
                (can_use(Hoverboots) and (can_jumpslash or has_explosives)) or
                (is_child and (can_jumpslash or glitch_gerudo_chicken_itemless)) or
                (is_adult and (can_ride_epona or gerudo_fortress == 'open' or 'Carpenter Rescue'))

events.Broken Sword Access: is_adult and ('Poachers Saw Access' or Poachers_Saw)

locations.GV Chest: (can_use(Megaton_Hammer) or can_mega or can_hover or can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hoverboots)) and is_adult
locations.GV GS Behind Tent: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and at_night and is_adult
locations.GV GS Pillar: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and at_night and is_adult

                (can_use(Hoverboots) and (has_explosives or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))) or
                gerudo_fortress == 'open' or 'Carpenter Rescue'
exits.GV Crate Ledge:
(can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega) and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or Fairy or can_use(Nayrus_Love)) or

locations.GF Chest: can_mega or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Scarecrow) or can_use(Longshot)

locations.GF HBA 1500 Points: Gerudo_Membership_Card and can_ride_epona and Bow and is_adult
locations.Hideout Jail Guard (1 Torch): is_adult or (is_child and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Slingshot) or (has_bombchus and (Nuts or can_use(Boomerang)))))
locations.Hideout Jail Guard (2 Torches): is_adult or (is_child and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Slingshot) or (has_bombchus and (Nuts or can_use(Boomerang)))))
locations.Hideout Jail Guard (3 Torches): is_adult or (is_child and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Slingshot) or (has_bombchus and (Nuts or can_use(Boomerang)))))
locations.Hideout Jail Guard (4 Torches): is_adult or (is_child and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks or can_use(Hammer) or can_use(Slingshot) or (has_bombchus and (Nuts or can_use(Boomerang)))))
locations.GF GS Archery Range: (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and is_adult and at_night

events.GF Gate Open:
is_adult and Gerudo_Membership_Card and
                (shuffle_gerudo_card or shuffle_overworld_entrances or shuffle_special_interior_entrances)

exits.Gerudo Fortress: is_adult or can_hover or (shuffle_overworld_entrances and 'GF Gate Open')

locations.Colossus Freestanding PoH:
(is_adult and here(can_plant_bean)) or
                at('Mirror Shield Hand Known',
                can_mega or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_bomb_slide or Megaton_Hammer or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(0.5))))) or
                at('Silver Gauntlets Hand Known',
                can_mega or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_bomb_slide or (Megaton_Hammer and can_shield) or (has_explosives and can_live_dmg(1.0))))) or
                (can_hover and glitch_insane)
locations.Colossus GS Tree: is_adult and (can_use(Hookshot) or can_hover or can_use(Boomerang)) and at_night

exits.Colossus Grotto: can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or (can_weirdclip and glitch_insane) or (can_ledge_cancel and is_child)
exits.Silver Gauntlets Hand Known:
glitch_spirit_hands and can_use(Hookshot) and
                ((can_hover and (Hover_Boots or (glitch_qpa and Bombs and has_bombchus))) or
                (here(can_plant_bean) and can_shield and Hover_Boots and ((can_bomb_slide and Bombs) or Megaton_Hammer)))
exits.Mirror Shield Hand Known:
glitch_spirit_hands and can_hover and ((here(can_plant_bean) and is_adult and
                (has_bombchus or (glitch_qpa and has_first_person_item) or Hover_Boots or glitch_insane)) or
                (glitch_insane and has_bombchus))

exits.Beyond Door of Time:
can_play(Song_of_Time) or open_door_of_time or
                (((Hover_Boots and (Hylian_Shield or Mirror_Shield)) or has_2h_sword) and glitch_dot_skip)

exits.OGC Great Fairy Fountain:
at_dampe_time and (can_use(Golden_Gauntlets) or
                (has_explosives and (can_live_dmg(0.5) or can_use(Nayrus_Love))) or (can_use(Hover_Boots) and (can_shield or can_use(Megaton_Hammer))) or glitch_insane)
exits.Ganons Castle Lobby:
at_dampe_time and can_build_rainbow_bridge or
                (glitch_bridge_skip and (can_hover or (can_bomb_slide and can_use(Hover_Boots))))

events.Skull Mask: Zeldas_Letter and (complete_mask_quest or at('Kakariko Village', is_child))
events.Trade Skull Mask: complete_mask_quest or ('Skull Mask' and at('Lost Woods', (is_child and can_play(Sarias_Song))))

events.Trade Bunny Hood: complete_mask_quest or ('Trade Spooky Mask' and at('Hyrule Field', (is_child and has_all_stones)))
